name: launch-external-process
description: An example of how to use launch external process

scripts.build: npm run build-server & npm run build-client
scripts.dos: desktop-owner-settings.bat && (npm run -s kill:fin || true) && (npm run -s kill:rvm || true)
scripts.kill: (npm run -s kill:fin || true) && (npm run -s kill:rvm || true)

author: @adam-saland
